K10D0303_H0306:196a-1: shr'i la sam yukta s'u tra /
K10D0303_H0306:196a-3: tshul khrims yang dag par ldan pa'i mdo /
K10D0303_H0306:196a-4: thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10D0303_H0306:196a-5: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
K10D0303_H0306:196a-6: bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu
K10D0303_H0306:196a-7: rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon na med zas sbyin gyi
K10D0303_H0306:196a-9: dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po brgya phrag phyed dang bcu gsum dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te /
K10D0303_H0306:196a-10: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K10D0303_H0306:196a-11: dge slong dag; shes pa ni 'grib /
K10D0303_H0306:196a-13: tshe'i 'du byed ni nges par 'joms par 'gyur na /
K10D0303_H0306:196a-15: brtul ba brtan pos sgrub par mi byed /
K10D0303_H0306:196a-16: mi'i lus ni shin tu rnyed par dka' na de
K10D0303_H0306:196a-17: thob nas des rnyed pa'i rgyal ba'i bstan pa la
K10D0303_H0306:196a-18: rab tu byung ba'ang rnyed na thar pa'i don dang
K10D0303_H0306:196a-19: mi mthun pa dag gis bslus te sdug bsngal bar
K10D0303_H0306:196a-20: gyur ta re / dge slong dag /
K10D0303_H0306:196a-21: srog dang bral zhing shi ba ni sla yi /
K10D0303_H0306:196a-22: tshul khrims nyams pa ni de lta ma yin no //
K10D0303_H0306:196b-0: srog dang bral ba ni tshe 'di nyid kyi skye ba zad @196b par 'gyur gyi /
K10D0303_H0306:196b-1: tshul khrims nyams shing zhig pa ni skye ba 'bum
K10D0303_H0306:196b-2: phrag brgya'i bar du rigs dang bral zhing bde ba
K10D0303_H0306:196b-3: spangs te rnam par ltung ba nyams su myong bar
K10D0303_H0306:196b-4: 'gyur ro // de phyir ston pas tshul khrims rab bsngags bshad //
K10D0303_H0306:196b-5: tshul khrims ldan pa sangs rgyas 'byung dang phrad //
K10D0303_H0306:196b-6: tshul khrims ldan pa rgyan rnams kun gyi mchog /
K10D0303_H0306:196b-7: tshul khrims 'byor ba dri dang byug pa yin //
K10D0303_H0306:196b-8: tshul khrims ldan pa dga' ba kun gyi gnas //
K10D0303_H0306:196b-9: tshul khrims ldan pa gdung ba sel ba'i chu //
K10D0303_H0306:196b-10: tshul khrims ldan pa 'jig rten kun gyis bstod //
K10D0303_H0306:196b-11: tshul khrims dag gis 'gro ba dam pa mnos //
K10D0303_H0306:196b-12: ji ltar sprul pa gdug klu chen nag po yang //
K10D0303_H0306:196b-13: tshul khrims can la gnod med gzhan ci smos //
K10D0303_H0306:196b-14: tshul khrims ldan pa'i dge slong 'od dang ldan //
K10D0303_H0306:196b-15: tshul khrims ldan pa grags 'gyur bde ba thob //
K10D0303_H0306:196b-16: tshul khrims ldan pa mtho ris 'gro ba'i rgyu //
K10D0303_H0306:196b-17: tshul khrims bsrungs pas mya ngan 'da' thob 'gyur //
K10D0303_H0306:196b-18: ji ltar mig med gzugs mthong mi rung ltar //
K10D0303_H0306:196b-19: de bzhin tshul khrims med na chos mi mthong //
K10D0303_H0306:196b-20: ji ltar rkang med lam 'jug ga la nus //
K10D0303_H0306:196b-21: de bzhin tshul khrims med na thar mi 'gyur //
K10D0303_H0306:196b-22: ji ltar bum pa bzang po rin chen snod //
K10D0303_H0306:196b-23: de bzhin tshul khrims chos rnams skyed pa'i gzhi //
K10D0303_H0306:196b-24: ji ltar bum chag rin chen snod mi rung //
K10D0303_H0306:196b-25: de bzhin tshul khrims ral pas chos kun gtugs /
K10D0303_H0306:197a-0: @197a *// dang po tshul khrims med par gyur pa des //
K10D0303_H0306:197a-1: phyi nas mya ngan 'das pa thob snyam mam //
K10D0303_H0306:197a-2: sna dang rna rdum la sogs pa gang yin pa /
K10D0303_H0306:197a-3: de la me long dag ni dgos mi 'gyur //
K10D0303_H0306:197a-4: rna bas ma thos mig sngar ma mthong bzhin //
K10D0303_H0306:197a-5: bstan srung mi de mtho ris 'gro bar 'gyur //
K10D0303_H0306:197a-6: thos mang thos ldan thos srung mtho ris nyid //
K10D0303_H0306:197a-7: bud med bstan du ga la rung //
K10D0303_H0306:197a-8: rgyal po'i pho brang ga la dga'//
K10D0303_H0306:197a-9: dbu ba snying po ga la yod //
K10D0303_H0306:197a-10: longs spyod rtag pa ga la yin //
K10D0303_H0306:197a-11: bud med dag la rung ba med //
K10D0303_H0306:197a-12: rgyal srid dag la dga' ba med //
K10D0303_H0306:197a-13: dbu ba dag la snying po med //
K10D0303_H0306:197a-14: longs spyod dag la rtag pa med //
K10D0303_H0306:197a-15: longs spyod dag ni 'bab chu bzhin //
K10D0303_H0306:197a-17: me tog ci 'dra gzugs de bzhin //
K10D0303_H0306:197a-18: srog ni chu bur 'dra ba yin //
K10D0303_H0306:197a-19: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas /
K10D0303_H0306:197a-20: dge slong de dag yi rangs te /
K10D0303_H0306:197a-21: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
